instruction.en:
Make sure you have the 5-digit DSK PIN found on the package or under the QR code printed on the device.

Press and hold the button on the front of the device for ~3 seconds. The LED will blink green three times followed by a brief pause.

Locate the pinhole reset button on the back of the device in the battery compartment. Use a paper clip or similar object and tap the pinhole button. The LED turns on solid red to indicate the device was removed from the network.
